faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started - short and clear.

questions.q: How does ReplAInow integrate with Shopify?
questions.a: Via app installation. After connecting, ReplAInow pulls relevant data (orders, shipping status, products) GDPR-compliant directly from Shopify to generate responses.
Yes. Data is processed for specific purposes. You can restrict or withdraw data access at any time. We only store what's necessary for responses.

questions.q: How fast do I get responses?
questions.a: In seconds. ReplAInow structures the request, checks relevant Shopify data and delivers a brand-compliant response - usually under 3 seconds.

questions.q: Can I customize the brand tone?
questions.a: Yes. You define style guidelines (e.g., formal/informal tone, emojis). Responses are automatically aligned to this.

questions.q: What does the pricing look like?
questions.a: Transparent plans with clear limits, 14 days free trial without credit card. Upgrade possible anytime.
